name: We Are Healed
description:
Bishop Eric McDaniel presents the "TLC Cathedral Choir" in their first live recording entitled "We Are Healed: Live in New York".  This album flaunts not only Bishop McDaniel's time honored skill as a brilliant songwriter, but also his unparalleled success with developing masterful sounds from musical groups.  This CD features Bishop McDaniel as well as recording artist "Coko" and the original version of the infamous hit "One More Chance", written by Bishop McDaniel and re-recorded by Ricky Dillard.

Product Code: CD-Music-2001

name: Restoration
description:
Bishop Eric McDaniel features the "TLC Cathedral Choir" in their sophomore release “RESTORATION” which is a veritable gospel music collector’s item for both the singer and musician. It opens on a high note with “Taking It Back” featuring Bishop McDaniel on lead and runs through the gamut of urban, classic and contemporary gospel to the final track -  a cover of “Holy One” by Walter Hawkins. 

You will definitely want to have this CD in your music library!

Product Code: CD-Music-2007

name: Dangerous Frustrations
description:
Bishop Eric McDaniel explores the results when our problems and issues are compounded which can lead to "Dangerous Frustrations".  This 2-part series expounds upon the things that we all face in our day-to-day lives, how it affects us and why we must confront and conquer frustration.

NOTE: This is a 2-part series.  You should order 1 or 2 copies respective to the parts you would like to own.

Product Code: CDI-092709-01
           Part 2: CDI-100709-01

name: The Day the Straw Stopped
description:
Bishop Eric McDaniel ministers on how to deal with moving forward when God is trying to break your dependency on people. Before you can be removed from a person or a system in your life, you must first understand how to survive without what you've vested your trust in.

Product Code: CDI-101809-01

name: You Almost Stole My Destiny
description:
Bishop Eric McDaniel delves into the life of Elijah and explains how even a person with promise and destiny can become vulnerable and side-tracked, losing their course and potentially risking their blessing if they are deterred by the voices meant to throw them off course.

Product Code: CDI-102509-01
